About ME

Let me tell you something...

Enthusiastic hard learning programmer with multi-skillsets

I am a recent graduate from York University Digital Meida Program. I am conversable that can always get on well with other people around me. Through My previous study and social experiences from school and society, I can tell that I am always optimistic when conquered different problems. I like to learn new skills and always passionate about solving new problems through multi-tasking. I believe my education background, past work experience, skillsets with self-learning ability and passion for solving multitasking problems have prepared me well to deliver real value as a front-end or fullstack developer for our company. My resume is enclosed for your review. I would welcome an opportunity to speak with you to further discuss my experience and what I can offer to that position. Thank you for your time and consideration.
